rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0001
rows.name: Citizens of NLA, this is Secretary Nagi.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0002
rows.name:
Those of you that have served under me—here,
or on the White Whale—know I'm not one to mince words.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0003
rows.name: So I'll get right to the point:[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0004
rows.name: We are at war.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0005
rows.name:
Even now, the hostile alien force known as
the Ganglion is marching on New Los Angeles.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0006
rows.name:
We know they possess Skell-class ground-based units,
and we have reports of unidentified flying weaponry as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0007
rows.name: Director General Chausson is attempting to open a dialogue,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0008
rows.name:
but our enemy has shown no signs
of being open to negotiation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0009
rows.name: In light of all this, it is my duty to prepare us all for the worst.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0010
rows.name:
And this is why I've called an emergency assembly
of all BLADE divisions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0011
rows.name:
To be clear, none of this changes our mission
with regards to recovering the Lifehold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0012
rows.name:
But in the short term, it is absolutely
CRUCIAL that we protect our city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0013
rows.name:
Not just for our fellow humans, but for the Ma-non
and our other xenoform allies as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0014
rows.name:
New Los Angeles is home to us all—
including our brothers and sisters yet to be awakened.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0015
rows.name:
In that spirit, the Ma-non have agreed to use their ship
to ferry all noncombatants out of the combat zone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0016
rows.name: This is a temporary measure.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0017
rows.name: But also, a very good example...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0018
rows.name:
of how we all—human and xenoform alike—
must sacrifice and contribute to our common cause.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0019
rows.name: For those of us who will fight,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0020
rows.name:
I promise you that once we prevail,
any mimeosome damaged or destroyed will be fully restored.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0021
rows.name: Troops...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0022
rows.name:
A trying battle awaits us, but we MUST repel
the coming invasion. No matter what the cost.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08040100_MSG0023
rows.name: We're counting on you.[ST:wait ]
